explanation: [0-0] On a sandy beach, a hand holds a blue balloon, while a Coca-Cola bottle figure made of many small round black and red objects appears on the sand. The white caption "Coke" is on the bottle.

[0-5] Next, a person wearing a bird head mask uses both hands to place a blue balloon on top of the Coca-Cola bottle figure on the beach. They use a long needle in their hand to pop the balloon, scattering some white round pieces onto the figure. Then, the person in the bird head mask steps back a few steps. They are wearing a white top and trousers, and a distant oasis with some trees can be seen.
